title: Initiate International Wire Transfer
description: A customer needs to send $2,500 USD to a recipient in the United Kingdom.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer and collect all required recipient and bank details (Name, Address, IBAN, SWIFT/BIC).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely verifies the customer and accurately collects all necessary transfer information.

tasks.description: Calculate the total cost including the transfer fee and currency exchange rate, and get customer confirmation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the total debit amount and receives approval from the customer.

tasks.description: Execute the wire transfer and provide the customer with a confirmation number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the transfer and provides the correct reference number.
